name: Deluxe Sea View Room
description: Spacious room featuring a private balcony with stunning sea views, a king-sized bed, and modern amenities including free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a minibar.

name: Garden View Room
description: Elegant room with views of the hotel's lush gardens. Includes a queen-sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, and a coffee maker.

name: Luxury Poolside Suite
description: Luxurious suite located by the pool, featuring a private terrace, a king-sized bed, a seating area, and a spacious bathroom with a rain shower.

name: Classic Twin Room
description: Comfortable twin room with two single beds, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and an en-suite bathroom. Perfect for friends traveling together.

name: Executive Suite with City View
description: Executive suite with panoramic city views, a king-sized bed, a separate living area, a work desk, and a marble bathroom with a soaking tub.

name: Family Room with Garden Access
description: Spacious family room with direct access to the garden, featuring a queen-sized bed and two single beds, a mini-fridge, and a play area for children.

name: Penthouse Suite with Ocean View
description: Exclusive penthouse suite with breathtaking ocean views, a private terrace, a fully equipped kitchen, a Jacuzzi, and a master bedroom with a king-sized bed.

name: Standard Single Room
description: Cozy single room with a comfortable bed, free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom. Ideal for solo travelers.

name: Superior Double Room
description: Elegant double room with modern decor, a king-sized bed, a seating area, and an en-suite bathroom with luxury toiletries.

name: Junior Suite with Pool View
description: Spacious junior suite with a pool view, featuring a king-sized bed, a sofa bed, a mini-bar, and a luxurious bathroom with a rain shower.

name: Cozy Family Room
description: Comfortable family room with a queen-sized bed and bunk beds, featuring a small kitchenette, a seating area, and a private bathroom.

name: Executive King Room
description: Luxurious king room with a city view, a spacious work desk, a sitting area, and an en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower.

name: Grand Suite with Terrace
description: Spacious grand suite with a private terrace, featuring a king-sized bed, a separate living room, a dining area, and a luxurious bathroom with a bathtub.

name: Deluxe Garden Suite
description: Deluxe suite with garden views, featuring a king-sized bed, a separate living area, a kitchenette, and a marble bathroom with a walk-in shower.

name: Standard Twin Room
description: Comfortable twin room with two single beds, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and an en-suite bathroom with a shower. Ideal for business travelers.

name: Presidential Suite
description: Luxurious presidential suite with panoramic views, featuring a master bedroom with a king-sized bed, a spacious living area, a dining room, and a private Jacuzzi.

name: Economy Single Room
description: Simple single room with a comfortable bed, a work desk, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom. Perfect for budget travelers.

name: Premium Double Room
description: Elegant double room with a king-sized bed, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, and an en-suite bathroom with luxury toiletries.

name: Cozy Double Room
description: Cozy double room with a queen-sized bed, free Wi-Fi, a coffee maker, and an en-suite bathroom with a shower.

name: Deluxe Family Suite
description: Spacious family suite with a king-sized bed and two single beds, featuring a living area, a kitchenette, and a balcony with garden views.

name: Romantic Ocean View Room
description: Perfect for couples, this room offers a king-sized bed, a private balcony with ocean views, and a spacious bathroom with a soaking tub.

name: Cozy Mountain View Room
description: Enjoy stunning mountain views from this cozy room featuring a queen-sized bed, a private bathroom, and a seating area.

name: Modern Studio Apartment
description: A modern studio with a fully equipped kitchenette, a comfortable king-sized bed, and a private balcony with city views.

name: Luxury Penthouse Suite
description: Experience ultimate luxury in this penthouse suite featuring a private terrace, a spacious living area, a Jacuzzi, and panoramic city views.

name: Elegant River View Room
description: Elegant room with a king-sized bed, a private balcony overlooking the river, and a spacious bathroom with luxury amenities.

name: Spacious Family Suite
description: Ideal for families, this suite offers a king-sized bed, two single beds, a living area, and a kitchenette. Includes a private balcony with garden views.

name: Contemporary City View Room
description: Contemporary room with a king-sized bed, a seating area, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom. Enjoy stunning city views.

name: Deluxe Poolside Room
description: Relax in this deluxe room located by the pool, featuring a king-sized bed, a private terrace, and modern amenities.

name: Junior Suite with Terrace
description: Junior suite with a private terrace, a king-sized bed, a living area, and a luxurious bathroom with a soaking tub.

name: Cozy Cottage Room
description: Charming cottage room with a queen-sized bed, a private bathroom, and a small kitchenette. Enjoy garden views from your private patio.

name: Standard Twin Room with Balcony
description: Standard twin room featuring two single beds, a private balcony with garden views, and a modern bathroom with a shower.

name: Luxury Beachfront Suite
description: Luxurious beachfront suite featuring a king-sized bed, a separate living area, a private terrace with ocean views, and a marble bathroom.

name: Comfort Triple Room
description: Comfortable room with a king-sized bed and a single bed, a private bathroom, a seating area, and modern amenities.

name: Deluxe Double Room with Balcony
description: Deluxe double room with a private balcony, a king-sized bed, a flat-screen TV, and an en-suite bathroom with a rain shower.

name: Superior King Room
description: Spacious superior room with a king-sized bed, a seating area, a private bathroom with a bathtub, and free Wi-Fi.

name: Charming Loft Room
description: Charming loft-style room with a queen-sized bed, a cozy seating area, a kitchenette, and a private bathroom with a shower.

name: Economy Twin Room
description: Affordable twin room with two single beds, a private bathroom, free Wi-Fi, and a work desk. Ideal for budget-conscious travelers.

name: Premium Oceanfront Suite
description: Premium suite with oceanfront views, featuring a king-sized bed, a separate living area, a private terrace, and a luxurious bathroom.

name: Rustic Cabin Room
description: Experience a cozy stay in this rustic cabin room with a queen-sized bed, a fireplace, a private bathroom, and stunning forest views.

name: Comfort Single Room
description: Comfortable single room with a cozy bed, a work desk, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom. Ideal for solo travelers.
